name: Snake vs Bricks Crash
description:
Collect coins and grow your snake. Tap at the right time to control your snake and sneak through the crash in this most challenging game Snake vs Bricks Crash.

Its simple yet addictive game ever. Easy to play, very interesting. You are also provided more amazing colours of snakes to unlock. Stay tuned more snakes are on their way.

Features:
- Free to play.
- Endless game.
- Multiple Snakes.
- Its not boring.

It looks easy but its really hard to master the gameplay. Give it a try.

Please don't forget to give your kind hearted reviews!!!
